alert.note: Alert for Northern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 10 at 3:13PM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 6 and 9 inches and and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Monday afternoon. * WHERE...Northern Somerset County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet, and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
